Literature.Title: Non-toxic antimicrobial peptide Hm-AMP2 from leech metagenome
Literature.Author: Grafskaia EN, Pavlova ER, Latsis IA, Malakhova MV, Ivchenkov DV, Bashkirov PV, Kot EF, Mineev KS, Arseniev AS, Klinov DV, Lazarev VN

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse fibroblasts McCoy:LC90=>100 µM,Human primary fibroblasts FF1:LC90=>100 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:LC90=>100 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis 168 HT(MIC=9.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ST88(MIC=18.5µM),Staphylococcus haemolyticus 527(MIC=4.6µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=18.5µM),Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=4.6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=18.5µM),Human Malignant Melanoma MeWo(LC90=>100µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(LC90=>100µM)
